scripts.patchVersion: npm version patch && cd trident-cli && npm version patch && cd ..
scripts.publishAll: npm config set registry=http://localhost:4873/ && npm unpublish @webank/trident --force && npm unpublish @webank/trident-cli --force && npm publish && cd trident-cli && npm publish
scripts.wpublishAll: wnpm publish && cd trident-cli && wnpm publish
scripts.reinstallCli: echo 'reinstall the newest trident-cli' && npm uninstall @webank/trident-cli -g && npm install @webank/trident-cli -g --verbose
scripts.wreinstallCli: echo 'reinstall the newest trident-cli' && wnpm uninstall @webank/trident-cli -g && wnpm install @webank/trident-cli -g
scripts.npmLocalPublishAll: npm version patch && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873 && cd trident-cli && npm version patch && npm publish --registry http://localhost:4873
scripts.test-tpl: echo 'test the trident framework' && rm -rf WeBookStore && trident-cli init --name=WeBookStore --bundleId=com.trident.wbstore --scheme=wbstore --eslint && cd WeBookStore && bundle exec fastlane ios release --verbose && bundle exec fastlane android release --verbose && rm -rf ./WeBookStore
scripts.syncLib: watchman watch ./trident-ui && watchman watch ./library && wml add trident-ui libraryDev/node_modules/@webank/trident/trident-ui && wml add library libraryDev/node_modules/@webank/trident/library && wml start
